page.title: 04LAW AND ORDER
page.content: We interviewed Constable Farrily our school policeman and Constable Jonston our community policman.The police we talked to covered a large area.There are about 4,500 police in Merseyside, about 250 are women. We had, until a few months ago, a { Police Band}.We spoke to Mr Peters (one of our school Governers)from the Police Band.He told us that there were 9 different types of instruments played by 22 police members. At our school 12 pupils are doing a{ {Civic Award Scheme.}This involves talks and visits,caring for people, being self reliant and working hard at certain skills. For our Civic Award we are doing a Police Project we had a visit to the police station were we saw lots of things including the dogs,cells and law courts.
